item.name: Dominant Species
item.comment: One game. Too long, too complicated, with 5 players takes whole day for questionable entertainment. Maybe with up to 3 players it would be better.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
Hej! To moja ryba!
item.comment: One of the best logic games for 3-4 players.

item.name: Konwój
item.comment: I'm very sorry, but I don't understand this Portal's production at all. :( Huge disappoinment for me.

item.name: List Miłosny
item.comment: Definitely has problems, but considering its shortness I can say it's ok.

item.name: The Little Prince: Make Me a Planet
Neuroshima Hex! Duel
item.comment: The worst expansion to Neuroshima Hex.

item.name: Potwory w Tokio
item.comment: Somewhat dumb, for sure not worth its price, still entertaining as hell. : P

item.name: Prêt-à-Porter
item.comment: One game. Really nice, but theme kinda kills it.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island
item.originalname: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
item.comment:
Simply the best cooperative game ever.
...Sold it because of lack of time, space and patience to deal with tons of components and rules exceptions.

item.name: Tikal
item.comment: One game. Volcanoes make no sense to me.
